post:
[<strong>...</strong>](http://ellipsisno.de/) hosts unmanaged virtual private servers via OVH in Montreal. Here are some new offers for late June!

Bandwidth is either metered (burstable to 1Gbps) or unmetered (upgradeable to 100Mbps), your choice.

<pre><a href="http://ellipsisno.de/let/"><strong>S&#257;mkhya</strong></a>  
1Mbps Unmetered or 1TB  
11GB HDD  
111MB RAM  
111MB VSwap  
<del>$111 / year</del>  
$11 / year (90% discount!)

<del>$999 / year</del>

$48 / year (95% discount!)  
$7 / month (93% discount!)</pre>

<strong>Specs?</strong> E5-1620 & E5-1650 servers with SATA RAID 1 HDD. OpenVZ virtualization. Each vps comes with 1 IPv4 address, SolusVM and lots of OS to choose from.

<strong>What do you mean by 'unmanaged'?</strong> I mean vps/containers aren't entered into without your consent and support isn't provided re: software errors/configuration/bugs/etc. At the same time there are multiple techs standing by and I'm often willing to attempt 'best effort' support.

<strong>DDoS protection?</strong> OVH's <a href="http://www.ovh.com/ca/en/anti-ddos/">anti-DDoS mitigation</a>.

<strong>Unmetered?</strong> No overage fees, but your vps will be suspended upon reaching its limit (9Mbps = ~3TB / month and so on).

<strong>9Mbps max?</strong> Upgrades are available for the following one-time fees:  
10Mbps - $1  
20Mbps - $2  
30Mbps - $3  
40Mbps - $4  
50Mbps - $5  
60Mbps - $6  
70Mbps - $7  
80Mbps - $8  
90Mbps - $9  
100Mbps - $10

<strong>Extra IPs?</strong> $9 / IPv4 / year or $1 / month. IPv6 = free.

<strong>Nightly backups?</strong> $1 / year.

<strong>Is X allowed?</strong> See the <a href="http://ellipsisno.de/terms/">Terms</a>.

<strong>Test IP?</strong> <a href="http://mtl.ellipsisno.de">http://mtl.ellipsisno.de</a>  

<strong>Further inquiries?</strong> PM or sales@ellipsisno.de. Tailor-made plans (i.e. > 999MB RAM) and subscriptions are available via http://ellipsisno.de/build/. Thanks for reading.
